Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lately \Late"ly\, adv. Not long ago; recently; as, he has lately arrived from Italy. [1913 Webster]

lately adv : in the recent past; "he was in Paris recently"; "lately the rules have been enforced"; "as late as yesterday she was fine"; "feeling better of late"; "the spelling was first affected, but latterly the meaning also" [syn: {recently}, {late}, {of late}, {latterly}]
